DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine implant-abutment design likely promote early soft-tissue healing process and/or enhance longitudinal peri-implant bone soft-tissue health .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effectiveness Laser-Ablated Implant-Abutments Promote Tissue Healing
DOC.detailed_description: The study assess integrity peri-implant oral soft-tissue attachment implant abutment compare tissue response laser-ablated implant-abutment implant-abutment manufacture smooth surface . Investigators assess initial post-surgical peri-implant attachment-seal test whether tissue-abutment interface re-forms equal integrity abutment remove replace new abutment . Data include histological , radiographic , clinical , subjective aesthetic compare effectiveness two abutment design . Both device supply BioHorizons Implant Systems Inc. Birmingham , Alabama ; abutment analogous design material except test device laser-ablated surface control abutment smooth .
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 19 year old 2 . Healthy enough go treatment 3 . Have one edentulous site exhibit adequate natural bone sufficient keratinize tissue 4 . Demonstrated willingness undergo study treatment comply study timeline 1 . Full edentulism 2 . Any chronic health condition medication opinion investigator may adversely affect bone heal 3 . Any indication inability make autonomous decision
